
add_custom_command (
  OUTPUT  VGrayCounter.cpp
          VGrayCounter.h
          VGrayCounter__Syms.cpp
          VGrayCounter__Syms.h
  DEPENDS GrayCounter.v
  COMMAND perl ${VERILATOR} ${VERILATOR_OPTS} -Mdir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR} -cc
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/GrayCounter.v
)

# Verilog .v files are added here so that they get added to any IDE project generated by CMake.
add_library (VGrayCounter STATIC VGrayCounter.cpp VGrayCounter__Syms.cpp
    GrayCounter.v
)

target_compile_options(VGrayCounter PRIVATE ${VK_CPPFLAGS})

target_include_directories(VGrayCounter PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

target_link_libraries(VGrayCounter verilated)
